item.title: Alien::wxWidgets 0.44 released
item.description: Alien::wxWidgets 0.44 was released to CPAN. See details on CPAN.

item.title: wxPerl 0.92 released
item.description: wxPerl 0.92 was released to CPAN. See details on CPAN.

item.title: Documentation updated
item.description: Updated documentation created from wxWidgets 2.8.7 manual is now available from the download page.

item.title: 0.81 released!
item.description: wxPerl 0.81 has been released to CPAN. This release features some new wxWidgets classes (but only for wxWidgets HEAD) and the addition of many more methods for older releases.

item.title: 0.80 released!
item.description: wxPerl 0.80 has been released to CPAN. This release features various new wxWidgets classes, plus the usal build fixes.
